provider.description: Provider to be used to connect to the router

operation.description: Operation to be performed with the given VRF

vrf_addressfamily.description: VRF address family configurations.Subsequent configurations will be skipped if af_type is not provided

af_type.description: type of address family to be configured

sub_af.description: sub address family to be configured. Only unicast option is available. Has no effect if af_type is not provided

maximum_prefix.description: Maximum table's prefix limit for the address family

route_target.description: list of route targets to import

rt_action.description: specify if the Rt list is merged or replaced.Has no effect if the VRF is new or route_target is not specified

route_policy.description: route policy to use for imported routes to this vrf

from_defaultvrf_route_policy.description: route policy to use for imported routes from default vrf to this vrf

route_target.description: list of route targets to export

rt_action.description: specify if the Rt list is merged or replaced.Has no effect if the VRF is new or route_target is not specified

route_policy.description: route policy to use for exported routes from this vrf

to_defaultvrf_route_policy.description: route policy to use for exported routes to default vrf from this vrf

mop_timeout.description: Timeout duration for MoP i.e. maximum time spent in Running/Paused states. e.g. 900s, 10m, 1.5h, etc. Valid time units are 'ns', 'us' (or 'Âµs'), 'ms', 's', 'm', 'h'.
